name: tink_spawn_02
text: I am perfectly suited for this enviornment.
text_simple: i am perfectly suited for this enviornment

name: tink_spawn_04
text: Sometimes I think you only want me for my hazard suit!
text_simple: sometimes i think you only want me for my hazard suit

name: tink_spawn_05
text: I have several theories I'd like to put into practice.
text_simple: i have several theories id like to put into practice

name: tink_begin_01
text: Conditions could hardly be more ideal!
text_simple: conditions could hardly be more ideal
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: tink_first_02
text: First blood! He he ha ha ha ha ha.
text_simple: first blood he he ha ha ha ha ha

name: tink_first_03
text: I'd love to get this under a microscope!
text_simple: id love to get this under a microscope

name: tink_move_12
text: Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
text_simple: are you thinking what im thinking

name: tink_attack_11
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Laser (25% chance)

name: tink_ability_laser_01
text: You can keep your magic, I have laser beams!
text_simple: you can keep your magic i have laser beams
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Laser (25% chance)|A master hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_ability_laser_02
pretty_criteria: Recieving an ultra rare cosmetic item

name: tink_ability_laser_03

name: tink_ability_laser_04
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Laser (25% chance)

name: tink_ability_heatseekingmissile_05
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Heat-Seeking Missile (25% chance)

name: tink_ability_marchofthemachines_02
text: And they said I was crazy!
text_simple: and they said i was crazy

name: tink_ability_marchofthemachines_06
pretty_criteria: Recieving an ultra rare cosmetic item

name: tink_ability_marchofthemachines_08
text: Aha... ah ha ha ha ha ha.
text_simple: aha ah ha ha ha ha ha

name: tink_ability_rearm_09
text: The massless field flux should self-limit.
text_simple: the massless field flux should selflimit

name: tink_ability_rearm_10
text: I've clamped the manifold parameters to... CY base and LG orbifold... Hilbert inclusive.
text_simple: ive clamped the manifold parameters to cy base and lg orbifold hilbert inclusive

name: tink_levelup_04
text: Hazard suits me! He he he
text_simple: hazard suits me he he he

name: tink_levelup_05
text: My experiment was an unqualified success!
text_simple: my experiment was an unqualified success

name: tink_levelup_06
pretty_criteria: Leveling up|A silver hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_levelup_08
pretty_criteria: Leveling up|A grandmaster hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_levelup_12
text: A ha, ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: a ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: tink_levelup_13
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: tink_kill_03
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_kill_06
text: In every meeting of minds, there must be a loser.
text_simple: in every meeting of minds there must be a loser

name: tink_kill_08
text: I'm building a future without you in it!
text_simple: im building a future without you in it

name: tink_kill_09
text: I really should patent that effect.
text_simple: i really should patent that effect

name: tink_kill_13
text: I hope it's clear which of us, has the degree!
text_simple: i hope its clear which of us has the degree

name: tink_rival_01
text: Rattletrap, all your parts are out of stock!
text_simple: rattletrap all your parts are out of stock

name: tink_rival_02
text: Letting me out of your sight was your first mistake, Sniper!
text_simple: letting me out of your sight was your first mistake sniper

name: tink_rival_03
text: Gyro, that craft of yours has made you dizzy.
text_simple: gyro that craft of yours has made you dizzy

name: tink_rival_04
text: What sort of loon believes in Alchemy?
text_simple: what sort of loon believes in alchemy

name: tink_rival_07
text: Anti-Mage, your efforts against magic do not go unappreciated, I assure you!
text_simple: antimage your efforts against magic do not go unappreciated i assure you

name: tink_rival_08
text: What you see before you, Chen, is truly intelligent design!
text_simple: what you see before you chen is truly intelligent design

name: tink_rival_09
text: Warlock, you should put down your spell book and pick up a textbook!
text_simple: warlock you should put down your spell book and pick up a textbook

name: tink_rival_10
text: Well, Lina, fire vs. laser beams, it's a timeless struggle.
text_simple: well lina fire vs laser beams its a timeless struggle

name: tink_rival_11
text: We have established the melting point of Crystal Maiden!
text_simple: we have established the melting point of crystal maiden

name: tink_rival_12
text: Should have taken up science, Invoker, magic's long term prospects are dim!
text_simple: should have taken up science invoker magics long term prospects are dim

name: tink_lasthit_03
text: I'll build a new lab with this!
text_simple: ill build a new lab with this

name: tink_death_04
text: It's probably not a problem, probably.
text_simple: its probably not a problem probably

name: tink_death_11
text: I can't take much more of this.
text_simple: i cant take much more of this

name: tink_respawn_01
text: I predicted all of this you know, all of it!
text_simple: i predicted all of this you know all of it
pretty_criteria: Respawning|A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_respawn_02
text: Thank goodness. My relief is almost palpable.
text_simple: thank goodness my relief is almost palpable

name: tink_respawn_03
text: I'm going to call that experiment, a failure.
text_simple: im going to call that experiment a failure
pretty_criteria: Respawning|A platinum hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_respawn_07
text: Good thing I bought that extended warranty!
text_simple: good thing i bought that extended warranty

name: tink_respawn_09
text: Hmm... Something else that needs tinkering with.
text_simple: hmm something else that needs tinkering with

name: tink_respawn_11
text: Must have put that last plan together out of spare parts!
text_simple: must have put that last plan together out of spare parts

name: tink_respawn_12
text: This is starting to remind me of the Seven Minute War!
text_simple: this is starting to remind me of the seven minute war

name: tink_rare_01
text: My suit should keep me comfortable through all of this.
text_simple: my suit should keep me comfortable through all of this

name: tink_rare_02
text: With my brains and your brawn, we'll make an excellent team!
text_simple: with my brains and your brawn well make an excellent team

name: tink_rare_03
text: Someone has hidden my glasses again!
text_simple: someone has hidden my glasses again

name: tink_rare_04
text: Well. I think it's rather stimulating, don't you?
text_simple: well i think its rather stimulating dont you

name: tink_rare_05
text: I'm the one man who knows everything!
text_simple: im the one man who knows everything

name: tink_rare_06
text: I hope someday I'll run into another survivor of the Violet Plateau Incident, but it's not looking promising.
text_simple: i hope someday ill run into another survivor of the violet plateau incident but its not looking promising

name: tink_rare_10
text: I've seen these things somewhere before.
text_simple: ive seen these things somewhere before

name: tink_bottle_02
text: I wish this was a Kleiner bottle!
text_simple: i wish this was a kleiner bottle

name: tink_travel_02
text: Let's see if I can't make a real nuisance of myself!
text_simple: lets see if i cant make a real nuisance of myself

name: tink_travel_03
text: By my bootstraps, here's where I earn my keep!
text_simple: by my bootstraps heres where i earn my keep

name: tink_travel_04
text: I intend to be a travelling pain!
text_simple: i intend to be a travelling pain

name: tink_travel_05
text: I predict these boots will leave a mark on the enemy's backside!
text_simple: i predict these boots will leave a mark on the enemys backside

name: tink_travel_06
text: Time to reboot and kick butt!
text_simple: time to reboot and kick butt

name: tink_deny_09
text: ah ha ha ha he he he
text_simple: ah ha ha ha he he he

name: tink_deny_14
text: Not for the likes of you!
text_simple: not for the likes of you

name: tink_lose_03
text: I lay down my tools forever!
text_simple: i lay down my tools forever

name: tink_immort_02
text: A well-oiled machine ought to run forever.
text_simple: a welloiled machine ought to run forever

name: tink_doubdam_02
text: Can one ever do too much damage?
text_simple: can one ever do too much damage

name: tink_regen_02
text: This will fix me right up!
text_simple: this will fix me right up

name: tink_illus_02
text: I'm of three minds on the subject.
text_simple: im of three minds on the subject

name: tink_invis_02
text: It's the unseen mysteries that hold my gaze.
text_simple: its the unseen mysteries that hold my gaze

name: tink_thanks_03
pretty_criteria: Thanking|A bronze hero chat wheel was used

name: tink_inthebag_01
text: My friends, this one is indubitably in the bag!
text_simple: my friends this one is indubitably in the bag

name: tink_taunt_01
text: If you were a genius like me, you'd be running for cover right now.
text_simple: if you were a genius like me youd be running for cover right now

name: tink_taunt_02
text: I've got a theory I'd like to test out. On your skull!
text_simple: ive got a theory id like to test out on your skull

name: tink_taunt_03
text: Try to outsmart me and you'll just end up smarting.
text_simple: try to outsmart me and youll just end up smarting

name: tink_laugh_07
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

text: Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
